name: Project Boost2D
description:
Gamedev.tv Game Jam Submission

This is my first attempt at making something beyond following a tutorial.

It is a modified version of Project Boost from the Gamedev.tv Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D Online Course.

Play in Full Screen for the best experience.

Source Code at:

spiegan77/project_boost2d: GameDev.tv Game Jam (github.com)
